title: Additional Options
tooltip: Customize Super Mario 64 with additional options

title: Rumble Support
tooltip: Adds Rumble Support to Super Mario 64

title: Lowpoly Promo Mario Model
tooltip: Replaces Mario's model with the promo model for Mario

tooltip: Replaces Mario's model with the promo model for Luigi

title: render96 Mario Model
tooltip: render96 patch with the Mario model with 3D models and promo styles for several objects{0}Both widescreen (stretched HUD) and puppycam can be enabled/disabled in the pause menu

title: render96 Luigi Model
tooltip: render96 patch with the Luigi model with 3D models and promo styles for several objects{0}Both widescreen (stretched HUD) and puppycam can be enabled/disabled in the pause menu

title: Termina Invasion
